title: The Frog
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Clyde Fisher
brief_description: Life cycle of the frog is presented. The development of the embryo is brought to the screen in a continuous scene of only a few seconds. The several changes taking place in the tadpole stages are portrayed by picture and narrative. Slow-motion photography demonstrates the graceful movements of the frog in jumping.
